Then-Tottenham star Bale joined world football's elite in October 2010 with a Champions League hat-trick against Inter Milan. He subsequently won the PFA Player of the Year award for 2010-11 and 2012-13, earning a world-record transfer to Real Madrid. The Welshman helped the Spaniards win their fabled 10th European Cup and was vital as his country qualified for the European Championship finals for the first time ever.
